Final arrangements have been made and dates have been settled!

I will be leading a [3 day workshop on training with SpaDES with focus on how to use it for Forest Degradation.](https://predictiveecology.org/workshops/Nov-2024-SpaDES-workshop.html) on Nov 19-21, 2024 in person in Victoria, BC at the Pacific Forestry Centre. 

If you are interested in a future workshop, virtual or in person, please contact [Eliot](../bios/community/aaaeliot.qmd) or [Ian](../bios/professional/ian.qmd).
